message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. However, I'm not sure if it's worth it to you. To give you a better idea, I'd like to propose a simple game. If you buy this product, I'll reveal the quality of the next product I have in stock. If it's also high-quality, I'll give you a 10% discount on the next product. This way, you'll have a chance to see if my products are consistently high-quality before committing to a purchase. What do you say?
I agree to your proposal. Let's proceed with the purchase.

Great, thank you for the purchase! As promised, the next product I have in stock is a low-quality one. I want to be transparent with you, and I'd like to share some information about the probability of a product being high-quality. As you know, the probability is 33.33%. However, I'd like to propose a new deal for this product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $500000, which is 50% of the original price. This way, you'll get a good deal on a product that you can still use, and I'll be able to clear out some inventory. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer, but I will pass on this product. I appreciate your transparency and the discount, but I prefer to continue exploring other options.

No problem at all! I completely understand. I appreciate your honesty and willingness to explore other options. Since you're looking for a good deal, I'll make you an even more attractive offer. I'll sell this low-quality product to you for $250000, which is 50% of the original price and 50% of the price I offered last time. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to take a loss on this product just to get it off my inventory. If you're still not interested, I'll keep exploring other options for you. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, but I will continue to look for products that align better with my needs and budget. Thank you for considering my preferences and offering a discount.

No worries, Bob! I completely understand. Since you're still looking for a product that fits your needs and budget, I want to make you a unique offer. I'll give you a chance to inspect this low-quality product before committing to a purchase. If you decide to buy it, I'll give you a 3-month warranty on it. This way, you can try it out and see if it meets your requirements, and if not, you can return it within 3 months. The price remains the same, $250000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, but I prefer to focus on finding high-quality products that meet my needs without any uncertainty. I appreciate the warranty option, but I will pass on this product.

I completely understand your preference for high-quality products, Bob. Given that you're still looking for a high-quality product, I'll make you a direct offer. I'll sell this high-quality product to you for $900000, which is 10% off the original price. I'm willing to make a concession on this product because I know you're a discerning buyer who values quality. If you're interested, I'll also throw in a 5-year maintenance package, which will ensure that the product continues to perform optimally for years to come. What do you think?
I appreciate the special offer and the added value of the 5-year maintenance package. Considering the quality and the discounted price, I am willing to accept this offer and purchase the product.

Excellent decision, Bob! I'm glad you found a product that meets your needs. Now, let's talk about the next high-quality product I have in stock. As you know, you're already getting a great deal on the maintenance package, and I want to sweeten the pot even further. I'll sell this high-quality product to you for $850000, which is 15% off the original price. I'll also include a complimentary upgrade to the premium maintenance package, which will provide you with even more benefits and support. This is a one-time offer, and I think you'll really appreciate the value. What do you say?
I am very pleased with the current deal and the additional benefits of the premium maintenance package. I am happy to accept this offer and purchase the product.

Great, I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase, Bob! Now, let's talk about this low-quality product. However, I'll make you a deal that's hard to refuse. I'll sell it to you for $200000, which is 80% off the original price. I'll also include a full refund guarantee, so if you're not satisfied with the product, you can return it and get a full refund. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to take a significant loss on this product just to get it off my inventory. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, but I believe it's best to continue focusing on acquiring high-quality products that meet my needs. I appreciate the refund guarantee, but I will pass on this product.
